name: Core Release 14.0
description:
We are pleased to announce our core API release 14.0! In this release we've included notable features such as:
A) One Click Sign In has been added to our API V2 for a simpler login experience.
B) New ways to your track user data with the Account Deleted User Profile APIs.
C) Increased SAML capabilities.
D) Invalidate an account and prompt the user to re-validate via email verification.

ADDED.text: ADFS SP implementation with SAML: Using ADFS (Active Directory Federation Services) you can now add any SAML provider as Identity provider
Invalidate Email API: Invalidate a verified account and send an email to prompt the user to re-validate the account
Account Archived or Account Deleted User Profile APIs: get quick & easy access to historical data on your users

IMPROVED.text: SAML as a Service Provider: We can act as a service provider for SAML.
SAML IDP: New Identifier dynamic mapping option
SAML IDP: Allow for mapping of LoginRadius Custom fields to your SAML assertion
SAML IDP: Set an Attribute Name as URL to support standard attribute conventions
One Click Sign In API V2: Newly introduced to our V2 APIs. Create a Seamless login experience by providing your users with a One Click Sign In solution
One Click Sign In Verification API V2: In relation to the above context, we have also added the ability to verify emails for Single Sign In

FIXED.text: Amazon OAuth support updated to the latest version
